chara.textHome:
Actually, the reason I can't swim now
is because I almost drowned in a pool
when I was little...

All because I was running,
slipped at the edge, and fell right in...

Ah, but it's not like I hate
swimming or anything!

It's just...I can't do it if I don't
have a swim float!
I swam with Felicia by holding on to her!

It was amazing! Forget about swimming,
I was struggling just to hang on!

Do you think maybe I could swim
without my float if my magic gets
more powerful? Possibly?

This is great! I just wish my swimming
improved at this pace!
Whenever I try to swim, I always tense up...

Then I can't move because of that
and my head goes under...
Maybe I need to learn how to relax first...

I should be able to take breaths while
swimming soon.
The timing's always given me problems.

I would suck in water whenever I raised
my head. But I think I get it now!

There! I finished inflating my swim float!
This should do for now...

I'm good to go whenever...
I'll flutter kick as hard as I can!

Tsuruno and Felicia are already
swimming in the ocean.
I'll try my best to swim, too!
If I can... I hope I can...
Maybe I'll leave it for another day.
What will we do for lunch today?
Soumen noodles? Or hiyamugi noodles?
Huh? No, they aren't the same!
The thickness is different!

Summer nights have their
own unique mood.

Like the gentle loneliness
after a big party finishes up...

I heard it's important to adjust the
temperature on nights
when it's too hot to sleep.
Oh, but be careful! Don't set it too cold!

It's the same every year. Summer feels like
it's over in the blink of an eye.

So we have to enjoy it as much as
we can while it lasts!
I can bring my swim float, can't I?

If a Witch shows up at the beach or pool,
I'll be useless without it...
Please let me!
I'm ready to go!

I brought a spare float, too, so in case
I lose this one or it springs a leak,
I'll be prepared!
I really love staring out at the sea.

It's like the sound of the waves slowly
envelops me and soothes my heart.

Whoa! Yachiyo told me about this brand
of sunblock. It feels amazing on my skin!

Does she know about this stuff
because she's a model?
We all went to pick out swimsuits together.

It was hard to choose, but I ended up buying
the first one I saw that I thought was cute.

Certain smells just remind you of summer,
don't they?

The ocean and pools are a given, but
nothing smells more like summer to me
than mosquito repellent incense!
Yachiyo's swimming form is so pretty!

I splash around and never go anywhere,
but she just glides through the water.
Tsuruno's a really fast swimmer!

She told me she even beat a 
motorboat in a race...
I wonder if she was telling the truth?
Felicia's swimming is really wild!

Her strokes are so intense,
people have mistaken her for a shark!

I went out to practice swimming and
sensed someone nearby...
When I glanced back, there was Sana!
She said she was worried about me.

We all came to the sea, had fun,
got worn out, stayed over together...

It'd be lovely to do this with
Ui and her friends someday.

I may not be able to swim,
but I'll fight my hardest!
I think...I managed to swim the whole way?

I wonder if there's some way
I'll be able to swim...
I just have to keep pushing forward!
I'm Iroha Tamaki!
Nice to...huh? Oh, this?
U-um, it sticks out, huh... This swim float...
Swimming for me is, uh...
I mean, I'm just hopeless at it...

Hey, do you think...
maybe I can swim a little now?!

You know...I think now I could swim
10 meters without sinking!

Little by little...
I have to keep swimming ahead!

Yachiyo told me if I keep using a swim float,
I'll never be able to swim...
She's exactly right! Uh huh!
But...I don't think I'm brave enough!

Tsuruno tried teaching me how to swim,
but she just kept saying

"Your hands go swish!
Your legs go splash!"
It was really hard...
